verses.name: Acts 9:40
verses.text: But Peter put them all forth, and kneeled down, and prayed; and turning him to the body said, Tabitha, arise. And she opened her eyes: and when she saw Peter, she sat up.

verses.name: Acts 9:41
verses.text: And he gave her his hand, and lifted her up, and when he had called the saints and widows, presented her alive.

verses.name: Acts 9:42
verses.text: And it was known throughout all Joppa; and many believed in the Lord.

verses.name: Acts 9:43
verses.text: And it came to pass, that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner.
